title: How many women do rock stars actually sleep with? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on the rock star. Some that are married are actually faithful to their wives while others will sleep with women every chance they get. This is true even if you aren’t a rock star. I was in a band for many years and even then women would offer themselves to band members. Same results some took advantage of the offers and some stayed loyal to their wife or girlfriend. We opened for big name bands and I could tell stories about several rock stars as we did get to party with several but I don’t do the whole kiss and tell thing. All I can say is you’d be surprised. I will give a shout out to the late great Stevie Ray Vaughn though because later in his career when I met him he didn’t party and he was very loyal to his wife. He was just a very great guy and so down to earth.
